gbvision.finders package¶

Submodules¶

gbvision.finders.circle_finder module¶

class gbvision.finders.circle_finder.CircleFinder(threshold_func, game_object, contour_min_area=0)¶

Bases: gbvision.finders.object_finder.ObjectFinder

finds a circular shaped object, like a ball or a disk

gbvision.finders.object_finder module¶

class gbvision.finders.object_finder.ObjectFinder(threshold_func, game_object: gbvision.utils.game_object.GameObject)¶

Bases: abc.ABC

this is an abstract class that represents an object finder an object finder is a type that outputs an object’s 3d real location based on an of it image it’s GameObject real-life parameters

gbvision.finders.polygon_finder module¶

class gbvision.finders.polygon_finder.PolygonFinder(threshold_func, game_object, area_scalar=1.0, contour_min_area=0)¶

Bases: gbvision.finders.object_finder.ObjectFinder

finds any generic polygon, not recommended when another finder can be used

gbvision.finders.rect_finder module¶

class gbvision.finders.rect_finder.RectFinder(threshold_func, game_object, area_scalar=1.0, contour_min_area=0)¶

Bases: gbvision.finders.object_finder.ObjectFinder

finds a rectangular shaped object

gbvision.finders.rotated_rect_finder module¶

class gbvision.finders.rotated_rect_finder.RotatedRectFinder(threshold_func, game_object, area_scalar=1.0, contour_min_area=3.0)¶

Bases: gbvision.finders.object_finder.ObjectFinder

finds a rectangular object, but rotated. recommended to use when you know the shape isn’t parallel to the camera

gbvision.finders.target_pair_finder module¶

Bases: gbvision.finders.object_finder.ObjectFinder
